jdbcService.sql: select c.child_id as component_id, c.min_occurs, c.max_occurs, t.name as child_template, a.name as parent_anchor, l.name as load_type from component_child c join load_type l on c.load_type_id = l.id join component_anchor a on c.parent_anchor_id = a.id join component_template t on c.child_template_id = t.id where c.parent_id = :parentId
